q: Why are your prices lower than typical agencies?
a: We’re a compact, senior team with a focused 7‑day cadence. Less overhead and fewer handoffs means you pay for outcomes—not ceremony.
A 50% deposit holds your start date and 50% is due on launch day. Card or bank transfer.
Design, build, copy polish, motion, performance, accessibility, analytics, and go‑live on Vercel. See “What’s included” below for details.
Yes. You own the code, content, and domains. We hand over a repo, edit guide, and Loom walkthrough.

q: What if we need more pages?
a: We prioritize the highest‑impact pages first. Extra pages become the backlog for your next sprint or Partner plan.
